definition: to dry (of weather, paint, cement etc)/desiccation/dull/uninteresting/arid
tree trunk/main part of sth/to manage/to work/to do/capable/cadre/to kill (slang)/to fuck (vulgar)

sentences.english: Temperature distribution was tested along thickness direction of Dendrocalamus giganteus timber under different hot pressing temperatures.
sentences.chinese: 测定了龙竹竹材在不同热压温度下干燥时的温度分布。

sentences.english: Drying temperature was one of the most important factors that would affect the properties of edible wheat gluten films.
sentences.chinese: 干燥温度是影响谷朊粉可食性膜性能的一个重要因素。

sentences.english: The trend in the Arab world leans towards aridity.
sentences.chinese: 这个在阿拉伯世界的趋势将趋向于干燥。

sentences.english: Its traditional function include eliminating wind and strengthening bones and muscles.
sentences.chinese: 的干燥根皮，其传统功能为祛风湿，强筋骨。

sentences.english: Are the surface of the boards and holes completely dry after deburr process?
sentences.chinese: 去毛刺后，板面与孔是否完全干燥？

sentences.english: Systems that use hydrogen chloride must be kept extremely dry.
sentences.chinese: 使用氯化氢的系统必须保持非常干燥。

sentences.english: UV coated photosensitive dry roll production lines.
While tempering after drying can reduced fissure Occurrence.
sentences.chinese: 干燥后润谷可减少裂纹的发生。

sentences.english: The windings should be cleaned and dried, and reimpregnated if necessary.
sentences.chinese: 绕组应清洁并干燥，如有必要重新侵漆。

sentences.english: The equipment allows a separate setting of temperature and speed of drying.
sentences.chinese: 温度和干燥速度可独立设置。

sentences.english: I have dry flaky skin that is so frustrating.
sentences.chinese: 我有片状皮肤干燥是如此令人沮丧。

sentences.english: Lyophilization(freeze-drying) is the most commonly used method for preparing solid protein pharmaceuticals.
sentences.chinese: 冷冻干燥技术是制备固体蛋白质药品的常用方法。

sentences.english: In addition, the stack tray can be easily dried since single deck thickness is reduced.
sentences.chinese: 另外，层叠式托盘降低了单层厚度，易于干燥。

sentences.english: The moist fuel gas from the drying operation is combusted to drive the turbine.
sentences.chinese: 从操作的干燥潮湿气体燃料燃烧来驱动涡轮机。

sentences.english: What is the difference between the contents of drugs when it is calculated on the anhydrous basis and on the dried basis?
sentences.chinese: 药品含量以干燥品计算或无水物计算有何不同？

sentences.english: Drying machine of the filter before adding the automatic device should be drainage.
sentences.chinese: 干燥机之前的过滤器应加装自动排水器。

definition: (of dry soil, skin etc) to crack/to chap
(of the sun) to scorch/to expose to a scorching sun
